title: Drawing, "Designs for Mechanical Furniture: Wardrobe, Desk and Dressing Table", ca. 1805
medium: Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Above, wardrobe; center, desk; lower, combination writing and dressing table; top, two plans, section and elevation; center, section and elevation; two plans, section and elevation. Below, scale.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Mechanical Furniture: Wardrobe, Desk and Dressing Table", ca. 1805.
ca. 1805. Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-473.
